Digital Twin v1 is Weeks Away!

The first version of Digital Twin will feature messaging and video calling.

Sam Taggart

19 February 2021

Recreate your digital life with Digital Twin. Where only you own your data, and no one else.

The first version of Digital Twin is weeks away and will come with private and secure messaging and video calling. After that, we’ll bring you a way to store your files – and much more.

twinupdate

Grid 2.4 is coming to mainnet soon!

We are in the final stages of testing Grid 2.4 & will soon release on mainnet!

3Bot Connect renamed to ThreeFold Connect

As mentioned as a preview in our October update, 3Bot Connect is now more accurately named ThreeFold Connect across devices.
